From task management to note-taking, document writing, time tracking, movie tracking, food tracking, everything stays

not_logged_in.description: LifeOS is a personal life management application that helps you organize your life, achieve your goals, and improve your well-being.

login.title: ðŸ‘‹ Welcome back!
login.description: Use you email and password to log back in and access your data.

register.email_description: Your email is used only for login and password recovery purposes.
register.we_never_sell: We will never sell your data to third parties.

delete_account.title: Delete your account
delete_account.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

mnemonic_key.title: Your recovery key
mnemonic_key.description_mid: Write it down and keep it in a safe place.
mnemonic_key.description_end: You will need it to recover access to your data if you forget your password.

reset_password.title: Reset your password
reset_password.subtitle: You don't remember your password?
reset_password.warning: You will receive an email with a code to confirm your identity, then you'll need your mnemonic key to get access to your data.
reset_password.no_mnemonic_data_loss: If you don't have your mnemonic key, you will lose access to your previous data.
reset_password.email_description: The email address you used to register.
reset_password.confirmation_code_description: Enter the code you received by email.
reset_password.confirmation_code_sent: A confirmation code has been sent to your email address.
reset_password.confirmation_code_sent_description: Please check your inbox and enter the code below.
reset_password.do_you_have_your_mnemonic_key: Do you have your backup key?
reset_password.backup_key_description: This is a 12-word key that you received when you registered. It is used as a backup for your data and is required to recover your account.
reset_password.yes_i_have: Yes, I have it, restore my data
reset_password.no_i_dont: No, I don't have it, delete my data
reset_password.reset_data_warning: I understand by selecting this option that all my previous data will be deleted and I will not be able to recover it.
reset_password.mnemonic_key_description: Enter the backup key you received when you registered.
reset_password.mnemonic_key_hint: business theme rotate together surprise wisdom powder knee view border local runway
reset_password.select_your_new_password_description: Enter a new password to later access your account.
reset_password.new_password_description: Enter a new password to access your account.

selfHostedUrl.title: Self-Hosted URL
selfHostedUrl.description: If you are using a self-hosted instance of Atomic Blend, you can enter the URL here.
selfHostedUrl.placeholder: Enter the URL of your instance

add_modal.title: Add a new tag
add_modal.name: Name of the tag
add_modal.name_description: Define a name for your tag, this will help you remember what it is about and be shown in notifications.
add_modal.color_description: Choose a color for your tag, this will help you remember what it is about and be shown in notifications.

delete.title: Delete tag
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this tag?
delete.warning: This action cannot be undone and the tag will be removed from all tags associated.

profile.email_same: Email must be different from the current email

subscription_payments.title: Subscription & Payments
subscription_payments.latest_subscription: This is your subscription with the earliest billing date.
subscription_payments.management_url_only_mobile: You can only manage your subscription from the iOS or Android app.

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.warning_changing_pws_will_log_you_out: Changing your password will log you out of the app.

under_construction.title: We're working on it!
under_construction.description:
This feature is not yet available, but we're working hard to bring it to you soon.

Stay tuned!

paywall.title: Get AtomicBlend Cloud
paywall.subtitle: Enjoy Atomic Blend without restrictions and help the opensource initiative.

all_apps_of_the_suite.title: All Apps of the Suite
all_apps_of_the_suite.description: Get access to all the apps of the suite, including Tasks, Habits, Calendar, Notes, and more.

unlimited_tasks.title: Unlimited Tasks
unlimited_tasks.description: Create as many tasks as you want, no limits.

unlimited_habits.title: Unlimited Habits
unlimited_habits.description: Take a step towards a healthier life with unlimited habits.

unlimited_tags.title: Unlimited Tags / Folders
unlimited_tags.description: Use as many tags and folders as needed to organize your life.

sync_across_devices.title: Sync Across Devices
sync_across_devices.description: Access your data from any device, anywhere.

community_backed.title: Community Backed
community_backed.description: 100% opensource : join a community of users who support the project.

paywall.payment_in_progress_description: Please wait while we process your payment.
paywall.validation_failed_description: Please check your internet connection and restart the app.
paywall.payment_on_mobile_for_better_xp: To offer you the best experience possible, payment and account configuration is only available on the mobile app

delete_note.title: Delete note
delete_note.description: Are you sure you want to delete this note?

folders.title: Folders
folders.name: Folder Name
folders.name_description: Define a name for your folder, this will help you remember what it is about and be shown in notifications.
folders.color_description: Choose a color for your folder, this will help you remember what it is about and be shown in notifications.

delete.title: Delete folder
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
delete.warning: This action cannot be undone and the folder will be removed from all tasks associated.
